issue.title: [CF 1079] Animation Feature bug
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Setup a condition icon
2. Condition Resouce Health <= 40%
3. Add notification Screen Flash on Show or While passing (either causes the bug to pop up)

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Screen to either flash one cycle or keep flashing during 40% condition

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.2.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
24x ...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:831: Bag argument #1 to 'TMW:InNLengthTable(arg)'. Expected table, got nil.
[C]: ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.2.3.lua:1116: in function `InNLengthTable'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:831: in function `DetermineNextPlayingAnimation'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:802: in function <...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:800>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:5>
(tail call): ?

...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:747: in function `Animations_Stop'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:304: in function `OnUpdate'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:124: in function <...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:117>
(tail call): ?

Locals:

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user ElectricMenace | Imported from CurseForge issue #1079 | Raw
